name: False Push Block
author: Alucard648
info:
"Why it`s blin - BOOM!" 
Made on request by SkyFlare
description: A block that looks like regular pushblock. But on attempt to push it like other pushblocks it starts blinking and then explodes, potentially causing damage to Link.
setup: Place invisible FFC with script at trap`s location. D0 - allowed directions. Add together: 1 - up, 2 - down, 4 - left, 8 - right D1 - Weight, bracelet power needed to push/set off this trap. D2 - Damage from explosion, in 1/4ths of heart D3 - Set to 1 - no activation until all enemies onscreen are killed. D4 - Fuse time, in frames, defaults to 60.
